fields.text: Thank you for calling PayPal South Bay, the faster, safer way to send money, make payments, and manage your account.
For assistance with personal accounts, press [INDEX].
To send or request money, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist in sending and requesting money. Your call is important to us.
For account security and support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a security specialist. Your call is important to us.
For merchant services and business solutions, press [INDEX].
To set up or manage your merchant account, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a merchant account advisor. Your call is important to us.
For payment integration and developer support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our integration support team. Your call is important to us.
